name: Problemnet vs Ball-Bot: hardcore platformer (DEMO)
description:
This demo version of hardcore arcade is a platformer, the various levels of which are puzzles, tests for speed and accuracy of the reaction, and in some cases even have runner elements, and various combinations of all these ingredients in different proportions.

According to the plot.
The world of Chebureks under threat, the artificial intelligence created by the Chebureks called “Problemnet”, is trying to go beyond the underground scientific research center where it was created.
And you act as the "Rescue Robot"-"Ball-Bot", the only one who can stop the Problemnet.
At your disposal teleportation, invulnerability mode and the ability to redirect enemy attacks in the direction you need.
Overcome all obstacles created by Problemnet, neutralize traps, solve puzzles, hone your skills, speed and accuracy of reaction, outsmart radio-controlled drones, find the right paths, collect all interdimensional batteries, and at the end defeat the Problemnet itself, disconnecting it and all captured systems of the Problemnet.

In the game, you can also achieve certain results and overcome levels to receive prizes in the form of replaceable skins of your robot, after which it can be turned into the desired shape in the wardrobe settings.
Improve your records of passing levels and collect a complete collection of bodys for your robot!

The game works without the Internet, without advertising and without micropayments.

* In this demo version, a limited number of levels are available.
